lcInstruction.p: The final element in a <taskbody> element is the postrequisites (<postreq>) element.
Use the <postreq> element to document the things that the reader must do once the task is complete. Examples include:

ul.li: Putting equipment away or closing files
Documenting or logging the task completion

step.cmd: After the <example> element, add a <postreq> element.

stepxmp.pre:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <!DOCTYPE task PUBLIC "-//OASIS//DTD DITA Task//EN" "task.dtd"> <task id="task_z5g_kkc_bt"> <title>Watching wild ducks</title> <shortdesc/> <taskbody> <example> ... </example> <postreq>
</postreq> </taskbody> </task>
